name: FENNEMORE CRAIG, P.C.
sampleDescriptions: Mining regulations concerning Arizona; briefing Members of Congress and federal agency officials regarding progress on NEPA review and Clean Water Act permitting for proposed mine.

Federal review of (e.g., pursuant to the National Environmental Policy Act and Endangered Species Act) and permitting and authorizations for (e.g., pursuant to the Clean Water Act) proposed Rosemont mine in Arizona.

Federal review of (e.g., pursuant to the National Environmental Policy Act and Endangered Species Act) and permitting and authorizations for (e.g., pursuant to the Clean Water Act) proposed Copper World mine in Arizona.
